alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:03PM CDT until June 03 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County. For the Denton Creek...including Justin...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Denton Creek Near Justin. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch lands near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to below 4.0 feet early next week. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
